channel.title: Clay County Emergency Gear & Deals
channel.description: Recommended safety gear and winter apparel.

item.title: MAGCOMSEN Men's Sherpa Lined Pullover
item.description: Heavyweight sherpa lined sweatshirts to keep you warm in cold weather.

item.title: Wrangler Men's Fleece Lined Carpenter Pants
item.description: Lined with warm fleece that won’t add bulk—perfect for cold-weather work.

item.title: Portable Jump Starter
item.description: Don't get stranded. Jump-start your car solo in seconds.
